<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <style>
      body {
        height: 100vh;
        margin: 0;
      }

      repeat-pattern {
        height: 100vh;
        width: 100vw;
      }
      
      :root {
        --background-color: #000000;
        --font-color: #ffffff;
        --font-size: 26px;
        --stroke-width: 1.2px;
        --stroke-color: #7acbf1;

        font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
        font-size: 1.5em;
      }
    </style>
    <script type="module" src="repeat-pattern.js"></script>
  </head>
  <body>
    <repeat-pattern chars="lit" num-prints="7"></repeat-pattern>
  </body>
</html>
